attributes.action: ensure that First Great Western are legally obliged to replace pre-paid railway tickets which have been accidentally lost by the purchaser prior to their journey.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition relates to my own unsatisfactory experience. Although I have proof of purchase they refused to replace train tickets - meaning I had to buy new tickets. My MP Jim Fitzpatrick took up my case to no avail.
